payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Simiona

texts.es:
Simiona sells basic food products at her grocery store. She is 36 years old and she has 3 children. There is nothing impossible for her, since she considers herself to be a very active woman and she is especially cheerful with her children and her clients. Her dear husband Mr. David supports her with all of her decisions and he helps her with her business. Simiona is a woman with a desire of self-improvement and success and she works hard for the being well-being of her dear children. She wants to see her business grow and for this reason she needs a working capital that will help her increase the quantity of products that she offers.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Simiona, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su bodega, tiene 36 años y 3 hijos. Para ella no existe nada imposible ya que se considera una mujer súper activa y sobre todo jovial con sus hijos y sus clientes. Su querido esposo el señor David la apoya en todas sus decisiones y le brinda su apoyo dándole la mano en su negocio. Simiona es una mujer con ganas de superación y deseos de éxito y se esmera por procurarles bienestar a sus queridos hijos. Ella quiere ver crecer su negocio y para ello requiere de un capital que le ayude a incrementar la cantidad de productos que oferta.

loans.use: Increase working capital to buy more products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Koku Séna

texts.fr:
Mr. Koku Séna G. was born on September 2, 1981 in Lomé. He is single and responsible for one other person. He started in the carpentry business in 2005. Given the growth of his business and the strong demand of builders, Mr. Koku Séna G. can no longer fulfill his clients’ requests because he delivers his work before being paid. This is why he is starting to lose some clients. To remedy this state of affair, he is requesting a loan of 300.000 FCFA to purchase twelve aluminum tubes and four glass panes of 8mm and 4m² each.

Translated from French by Véronique Fourment, Kiva volunteer.

Monsieur G. Koku Séna est né le 02 septembre 1981 à Lomé. Il est célibataire et a une personne à charge. Il a commencé par exercer l’activité de menuiserie depuis 2005. Vu l’évolution de son activité et la forte demande des constructeurs de bâtiments, Monsieur G. Koku Séna n’arrivait plus à répondre à la demande de ses clients car il livre le travail avant d’être payé. Ce qui fait qu’il commence par perdre certains de ses clients. Pour palier à cet état de chose, il sollicite un emprunt d’un montant de 300.000 FCFA pour acheter douze tubes en aluminium et quatre vitres d’épaisseurs 8 mm et de 4m² chacune.

loans.use: Purchase of aluminum tubing

loans.name: Katty

texts.es:
Katty is a self-sacrificing 37-years-old mother. She supports her family, made of her husband and two children. She has a small business of selling ready to eat meals. Due to the big acceptance and the varied requests from her clients, she wants to increase her working capital to offer meals of better quality and more complex in their preparation for delight of her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Katty, es una abnegada madre de familia de 37 años de edad, mantiene a una familia conformada por su esposo y dos hijos, y se dedica a diario a prestar sus servicios y atender cuidadosamente a cada una de las personas que la visitan en su pequeño centro de ventas de comida preparada. Debido a la gran acogida y las variadas solicitudes de sus clientes desea incrementar su capital de trabajo para ofertar platillos de mayor calidad y compleja elaboración para deleite de sus clientes.

loans.use: Have a bigger working capital to be able to offer a bigger variety of delicious dishes.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Señora Leonor is 55 years old. She is very lonely due to the loss of her two dear children and her beloved husband. Thanks to her great love for the kitchen, she has found in her devoted clients a big family who help her through moments of sadness. With them she shares part of the morning and a great part of the afternoon since they come and go quickly during the course of the day. To offer them better comfort, she desires to improve her sales space and for this reason she has requested a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Leonor de 55 años de edad, se encuentra muy sola debido a la pérdida de sus dos queridos hijos y de su amado esposo. Gracias a su gran amor por la cocina ha encontrado en sus asiduos clientes a la gran familia que le hace falta para aplacar momentos de tristeza, con ellos comprate parte de la mañana y gran parate de la tarde ya que acuden presurosos en su búsqueda al término de sus jornadas diarias.Par brindarles mayor comodidad desea implementar su espacio de ventas y a esta razón a tiende su solicitud de un préstamo.

loans.use: Improve her little sales space.

loans.name: Anne-Marie

texts.fr:
Having lived in Lomé for around 20 years, Mrs. Anne-Marie H. was born in Bénin on September 13, 1965. She is married and the mother of three children whose school fees and living expenses she provides. She sells cookies and sweets both wholesale and retail, a business she began in 2006.

The loan in the amount of US$ 1200 that she is requesting will allow her to expand her inventory by buying 15 cases of cookies and 24 cases of candies. This should enable her to increase her turnover and thus make substantially more profit from her business.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Installée à Lomé depuis plus d’une vingtaine d’année, Madame H. Anne-Marie est née au Bénin le 13 septembre 1965. Mariée, elle et mère de trois enfants dont elle assure la scolarité et le suivi. Revendeuse de confiserie en gros et en détail, elle a commencé cette activité depuis 2006.

Le crédit d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA qu’elle sollicite lui permettra d’augmenter son stock par l’achat de quinze cartons de biscuits et de vingt quatre cartons de bonbons en vue d’améliorer son chiffre d’affaires de et réaliser beaucoup de profit.

loans.use:
to expand her inventory of cookies and sweets

Augmenter son stock de confisserie

loans.name: Dunia Lisette

texts.es:
Mrs. Dunia D. is a native of the Villanueva municipality in the city of Chinandega, where she sells assorted products in her general store.

She is married and has one daughter, who is attending an elementary school near their home. Mrs. D. has had this business for 2 years, and over that period of time, she has been stocking her store with a wide selection of products for her customers. It is important to note that Ceprodel has supported her with the development of her business via loans that have allowed Dunia to improve her income. For this reason, she is once again turning to Ceprodel to request a new loan so that she can purchase more products, hoping that one day her dream will come true, which is to see her daughter become a successful professional.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La dama Dunia D. es originaria del municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega donde se dedica al negocio de la venta de productos varios teniendo su propia pulperia en el sector donde ella habita.

Es madre casada y con una pequeña hija el cual estudia en un colegio cercano a su hogar de habitación. El negocio de la señora Dunia posee 2 años y a medida que ha venido transcurriendo el tiempo lo ha venido surtiendo de variedad de productos para ofrecer. Es necesario destacar que Ceprodel le ha apoyado en el desarrollo del negocio por medio de créditos que le han permitido mejorar sus ingresos y por este motivo una vez mas acude para solicitar crédito y así suplir la necesidad que atraviesa el cual es la compra de los productos para así ver cumplido su sueño de que su hija se convierta en una profesional de éxito.

loans.use: Purchase of goods

loans.name: Felix Alexander

texts.es:
Felix G. makes cabinets for a living. He has acquired his vast experience in cabinetmaking first by learning the trade in a carpenter’s workshop, then by setting up his own business in his home in the Villanueva municipality of Chinandega.

This humble gentlelman needs to support his family, which he does by means of the profits earned from the business. Consequently, he needs to invest in the purchase of lumber and tools so that he can continue his work. For this reason, he turns to CEPRODEL in order to obtain the loan needed for him to get ahead, improving both his business and his family’s living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La actividad económica a la que se dedica el caballero Felix G. es la ebanistería teniendo basta experiencia en este ramo desde hace mucho tiempo habiendo aprendido en un taller de carpintería primeramente hasta que estableció su propio negocio de ebanistería en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega.

Una necesidad que hoy en día atraviesa este humilde caballero es el mantenimiento de su familia y esto lo hace por medio de los ingresos que proporciona su negocio y para ello necesita invertir en la compra de madera y herramientas para continuar con su labor. Es por esto que ha acudido a CEPRODEL para obtener el crédito necesario que le permita salir adelante mejorar la condición de su negocio y la de su familia.

loans.use: Purchase of lumber and tools

loans.name: Francisco Higinio

texts.es:
In Chinandega city, specifically in the Villanueva area there are many convenience stores near each other that service their customers with different products. Knowing this, Mr. Francisco Calderón has offered a variety of products in his store over the past 7 years.

Today he has the responsibility of supporting his family, a wife and three children, with their only income being that from the convenience store. It is important to note that his wife and children greatly support him and the business and with a united family their quality of life is better.

IN spite of the adversities that have happened they have bettered their quality of life and the need they have today is to acquire financing to invest in products for the store. For that reason they have sought the support of CEPRODEL to get a loan that will enable them to buy products to then sell in the store.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

En la ciudad de Chinandega específicamente hablando del municipio de Villanueva existen muchas pulperías cercanas que atienden a sus clientes con diferentes productos. Muy consiente de esto, el señor Francisco Calderón se dedica al negocio de pulpería en su sector ofreciendo variedad de productos desde hace 7 años.

Actualmente posee la responsabilidad de mantener su núcleo familiar que consta de sus tres hijos y de su esposa siendo su único ingreso el de la pulpería. Es importante recalcar que su esposa e hijos le apoyan grandemente en el negocio y por ello la familia unida hace que sus condiciones de vida sean mejores.

A pesar de las adversidades que han transcurrido han mejorado su condición de vida y la necesidad que atraviesan actualmente es la adquisición de recursos económicos para invertir productos al negocio. Por tal razón buscan apoyo en CEPRODEL para obtener créditos que permitan obtener los productos para luego comercializarlos.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise to sell in his store

loans.name: Kokoè Kossiwavi

texts.fr:
Born on December 25, 1977 in Lomé, Mrs. Kokoè Kossiwavi K. is married and the mother of four children. Her primary business is the sale of women's shoes in the big open-air market in Lomé. She has been in this business since 2001 and counts on her earnings from it to help her husband to support their family.

This first loan that she is presently requesting is in the amount of $1200 which will allow her to expand her inventory by buying 30 cartons of an up-to-date range of shoes. In this fashion, Mrs. Kokoe Kossiwavi K. will be in a position to have increased profits due to a higher volume of sales.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Née le 25 décembre 1977 à Lomé, Madame K. Kokoè Kossiwavi est mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle a pour activité principale la vente des chaussures de femmes au grand marché de Lomé. Elle mène cette activité depuis 2001 et tire profit de cette activité pour aider son mari dans les dépenses de sa famille.

Le premier crédit qu’elle sollicite d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA lui permettra d’augmenter son stock à travers l’achat de trente cartons de chaussures de nouvelle gamme. Ainsi Madame K. Kokoè Kossiwavi pourra dégager beaucoup de bénéfice à travers la vente d’une quantité importante.

loans.use:
purchase of an assortment of shoes for re-sale

Acheter une nouvelle gamme de Chaussures

loans.name: Jacinta Andrea

texts.es:
Mrs. Jacinta Gutiérrez is a native of the Villanueva municipality in Chinandega. She has been selling shoes and apparel for a living from her home for 5 years. At first, she did not have much success in her sales, but as time has passed, she has been improving her business, ultimately purchasing two display cases and a shelf, which she still owns today.

She is a married mother of 3 children under her care. She, alongside her husband, struggles to provide them with a better quality of life so that they can one day become great professionals. In order to see this dream come true, she has turned to Ceprodel for a loan that will allow her to purchase more merchandise to offer to her faithful customers. It is important to note that she has obtained 5 credits that have been paid off in a timely manner according to the loan terms.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La dama Jacinta Gutiérrez originaria del municipio de Villanueva en Chinandega se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos en su casa de habitación desde hace 5 años comenzando su negocio con pocas ventas que a través del tiempo ha venido mejorando hasta alcanzar comprar dos vitrinas y un estante que es lo que ella posee hasta ahora.

Es madre casada y con tres hijos a su cargo el cual en conjunto con su esposo se esfuerzan para proporcionarles un mejor nivel de vida y así puedan llegar a ser grandes profesionales. Para ver este sueño hecho realidad ha acudido a Ceprodel para obtener créditos que le permitan comprar la mercadería y así ofrecerla a sus fieles clientes. Es necesario destacar que ella ha realizado 5 créditos habiéndose cancelado satisfactoriamente en tiempo y forma de acuerdo a lo establecido.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es:
Juan Ramon V. is a gentleman originally from the Villanueva area, and since he was a young boy he has dedicated himself to the business of raising cattle, having his own farm which he has called “El Coyol” farm. He is the father to 4 school-aged children of whom is he very proud because they are excellent students and have stood out as the best students in their classes.

Today Mr. V. is asking Ceprodel for a loan that will enable him to buy young milking cows to raise, taking advantage of their milk by selling it. It is necessary to note that he has worked with Ceprodel for 5 years and his loan history has enabled him to improve his economic situation and improve his family’s standard of living.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

Juan Ramon V. es un caballero originario del municipio de Villanueva el cual desde su niñez se ha dedicado al negocio de la ganadería teniendo su propia finca a la que ha nombrado finca “El Coyol”. Es padre de 4 hijos en edad escolar el cual se siente muy orgulloso por ser excelentes alumnos habiéndose destacado como mejores alumnos.

Hoy en día el caballero V. acude a Ceprodel para obtener crédito que le permita la compra de vaquillas para criarlas y aprovecharlas para obtener leche y comercializarla. Es necesario destacar que desde hace 5 años ha venido trabajando con Ceprodel obteniendo créditos que le han permitido mejorar su situación económica y salir adelante junto con su familia.

loans.use: Buy calves and invest in crops

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Señora Rosa is 41 years old. She is immersed in commercial labor thanks to the management of her little convenient food store, through which she satisfies the needs of her dear family. She tells us that at this time she has attended to every one of her clients requests, but nevertheless, due to her capital, she has had difficulties attending to all the orders, which have been increasing steadily. For this reason she is requesting a loan so she may start giving attention to the requests of her clients in order to not lose their confidence in her.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Rosa de 41 años de edad, está inmersa en la labor comercial gracias a la administración de su pequeña bodeguita a través de la cual satisface las necesidades de su querida familia. Nos comenta que a lo largo de este tiempo ha atendido cada una de las peticiones de sus clientes, sin embargo conforme su cartera se ha ido incrementando tiene dificultades para atender las peticiones de sus clientes.Por esa razón solicita un préstamo a fin de iniciar la atención de los pedidos de sus clientes a fin de no perder su confianza.

loans.use: Boost of capital to increase the quantity and variety of her products.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Señora Luz for some time has been dedicated to selling sodas in her home with the help and advice of her beloved family. During the time that her business has been around, it has become very well known and highly recommended because in addition to selling the sodas individually, she sells them in large quantities for parties and holidays. She is in charge of making the orders and storing them until the big events. She desires to increase her investing capital to cover more of the large orders because right now she can only handle one large order at a time when some times there are a lot of requests.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Luz, desde hace mucho se dedica a comercializar bebidas gaseosas en su domicilio con la ayuda y consejos de su amada familia. Durante el tiempo de permanencia de su negocio se ha hecho muy conocida y recomendada porque además de venderlas por unidad acepta las peticiones en gran cantidad para alguna festividad, ella se encarga de hacer el pedido y de guardarlas hasta horas antes de que inicie alguna reunión de presencia masiva.Desea incrementar su capital de inversión para cubrir más de un pedido grande porque hasta ahora sólo puede con uno y a veces las peticiones son muchas.

loans.use: Increase capital to accept more of the big soda orders.

loans.name: Luisa Guillermina

texts.es:
In the municipality of Villanueva of the city of Chinandega, Mrs. Luisa J. dedicates her time working as a housewife and her husband as a farmer in order to maintain their home and their three children.

Unfortunately, through time the condition of the house where Mrs. Luisa lives has been deteriorating and due to their low income they have not been able to make any improvements. This is the reason for her wise request for a loan from Ceprodel for the purchase of construction materials to continue with the improvements of her home. This will enable her to provide better living conditions for her children.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

En el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega la señora Luisa J. se dedica a la labor de ama de casa y su esposo al negocio agropecuario para mantener el hogar y sus tres hijos a su cargo.

Lastimosamente a través de los años la casa de habitación de la señora Luisa ha venido deteriorándose grandemente y al poseer bajos ingresos económicos no han logrado mejorar esta situación por lo que muy sabiamente ha solicitado créditos en Ceprodel para la compra de materiales de construcción con el propósito de continuar con el mejoramiento del hogar y así darle un mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.fr:
Mrs. Afiwa K. Epse Danklou was born on October 14, 1947 in Tchékpo in the Yoto Prefecture, Togo. She is married and the mother of five children. Her primary business is selling everyday necessities and drinks in her little shop that she has named "Chez Maman". Ever since she opened the shop in the year 2000, she has been able to help her husband who is presently retired to have enough income to cover their children's school fees.

This first loan that she is presently requesting is in the amount of US$ 1200 and will allow her to purchase 10 cases of frozen foods, thirty cases of canned drinks, and twelve cases of mineral water in 1.5 liter bottles.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Madame K. Epse DANKLOU Afiwa est née le 14 octobre 1947 à Tchékpo dans la préfecture de Yoto au Togo. Mariée, elle est mère de cinq enfants. Elle a pour activité principale la vente des produits de premières nécessités et de boissons dans sa boutique qu’elle a dénommée « CHEZ MAMAN ». Depuis la création de sa boutique en 2000, elle a toujours aidé son mari qui est un retraité dans les dépenses scolaires de leurs enfants.

Le premier crédit qu’elle sollicite d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA lui permettra d’acheter dix cartons de produits congelés, trente cartons de boissons en canettes et douze cartons d’eau minérale de 1,5litre de contenance par bouteille.

loans.use:
Expand her inventory of cans of drinks, etc.

Augmenter son stock de boisson en canette

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
Marcia M. C. is originally from Chinandega city, living in the Villanueva area in her own home with her husband and her two small children. Her husband holds a job typical of this area, that of farmer raising his own cattle with which he earns his living to support his family. Marcia has realized that upon seeing the poor condition of her home, she has begun investing in investing for construction materials and to be able to pay laborers. Today this construction has been halted due to lack of funds and therefore she has sought support from Ceprodel, who has supported her previously with loans for construction.

It must be noted that Marcia has been a faithful Ceprodel client, paying her loans on time and according to the agreed terms.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva volunteer.

Marcia M. C. es originaria de la ciudad de Chinandega viviendo en el municipio de Villanueva en su propia casa de habitación que alberga a ella, su esposo y sus dos hijos pequeños. Su esposo se dedica al común trabajo en esta localidad como es el negocio agropecuario teniendo su propio ganado con el que se juega la vida para llevar el sustento al hogar. La necesidad actual que atraviesa la señora Marcia es que al ver la mala condición de su vivienda ha iniciado a invertir en la compra de materiales para construcción y pago de mano de obra. Hoy en día esta obra está detenida por falta de recursos económicos y por este motivo ha buscado apoyo en Ceprodel el cual le ha apoyado anteriormente con creiditos para su actividad de construcción.

No podemos pasar por desapercibido que ella ha sido una fiel cliente de Ceprodel pagando los créditos en tiempo y forma según lo establecido por ambas partes.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Koboté

texts.fr:
Mrs. Koboté K. was born in 1967 in Sotouboua. She is married and the mother of three children. Her primary business is the sale of everyday consumables such as milk, tomatoes, wine, pasta, couscous, eggs, etc. Since she is the only one in the Agoè Démakpoè neighborhood where she lives who sells such necessities, she makes a good income which allows her to contribute to the family's living expenses.

This first loan that she is requesting in the amount of US$ 1025 will permit her to purchase twenty bags of rice and 25 tins of vegetable oil which she intends to sell wholesale.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Madame K. Koboté est née en 1967 à Sotouboua. Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle a pour activité principale la vente des produits de consommation courante tels que : le lait, la tomate, le vin, les pâtes alimentaires, le couscous, l’œuf etc. Etant donné qu’elle est la seule à vendre ces produits dans le quartier d’Agoè Démakpoè, elle réalise beaucoup de bénéfice ce qui lui permet de participer aux dépenses de la famille. Le premier crédit qu’elle sollicite d’un montant de 420.000FCFA lui permettra d’acheter vingt sacs de riz et vingt cinq bidons d’huile végétale qu’elle revend en gros.

loans.use:
Expand her inventory of rice and oil to sell wholesale

Augmenter son stock de riz et d'huile

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana Milagros is 32 years old and the owner of a mototaxi, but at the same time she is dedicated to selling clothing for the nearby residents in her city. She has two young children who study in a modest education center. Her husband, Señor Richard, is the driver of her mototaxi and is the person dedicated to the care of this machine. In the future she desires for her kids to become successful professionals. It is for this reason that she also sells clothes to contribute to the family's needs. She requires a sum of money to invest in the maintenance and repair of their mototaxi, and much later to buy another mototaxi. Let's support this mother who continues working aduously with her effort and dedication to prosper.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

Juana Milagros, de 32 años de edad, es propietaria de un mototaxi, pero al mismo tiempo se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir por los caseríos más cercanos a su ciudad. Ella tiene dos hijos menores que estudian en un modesto centro educativo. Su esposo el señor Richard es el chofer de su mototaxi y es quien se dedica al cuidado de esta herramienta de trabajo, en el futuro desea que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales de éxito, es por eso que también vende ropas para contribuir con el sustento de su familia.Requiere de una suma de dinero para invertirlos en el mantenimiento y arreglo de su herramienta de trabajo, y muy posteriormente comprarse otro mototaxi. Apoyemos a esta madre que con esfuerzo y dedicación sigue trabajando arduamente por prosperar.

loans.use: Buy spare parts to improve the conditions of her mototaxi.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Doña Elva has a little business selling automobile oils and she also has a modest automobile that her beloved husband drives. She is in charge of managing these two sources of family economic income and so far, thanks to her sharpness, things have improved considerably for her family. Her desire is to increase her working capital to improve the space for her oil sales in order to convert it into one of the most visited and best in her city. Precisely for this purpose, she is soliciting a financial loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

Doña Elva, tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de lubricantes además de un modesto automóvil que conduce su querido esposo, ella esta a cargo de la administración de estas dos fuentes de ingreso económico familiar y hasta el momento gracias a su agudeza las cosas han mejorado notablemente para su familia.Tiene el deseo de incrementar su capita de trabajo para mejorar el espacio de ventas de lubricantes a fin de convertirlo en uno de las más visitados y mejor implementados de su ciudad. Precisamente a este propósito atiende la solicitud de un préstamo de dinero.

loans.use: Boost of capital to improve the service and quantity of products in her little sales space.

loans.name: Atsou

texts.fr:
Born on March 1, 1977 in Lomé, Mr. Atsou M. married Miss Hétchéli Lawson who is a dressmaker. His primary business is raising laying hens in Agoè. He began this business in 2002, but with many difficulties related to building an enclosure for his poultry. With a first loan of US$ 1200, which he faithfully repaid, he was able to complete the construction of the enclosure and purchase 50 chicks. Once the chicks mature they each produce an egg a day. Mr. Atsou M. went on to sell these eggs in trays of thirty eggs each.

This loan in the amount of US$1200 which he is presently requesting will allow him to buy 350 chicks which will eventually replace his former layers. In this fashion, he will be able to maintain a constant supply of eggs for his customers.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Né le 1er mars 1977 à Lomé, Monsieur M. Atsou s’est marié à Mademoiselle LAWSON Hétchéli qui est une couturière. Son activité principale est l’élevage des poules pondeuses à Agoè. C’est au cours de l’année 2002 qu’il a démarré cette activité avec beaucoup de difficultés liées à la construction de l’enclos. Avec un premier crédit d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA qu’il a bien remboursé, il a terminé la construction de l’enclos et a acheté cinquante poussins. Les poussins devenus poules, elles pondent un œuf chacune par jour. Monsieur M. Atsou dispose ces œufs en plateaux de trente et procède à la vente.

Le crédit d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA qu’il sollicite lui permettra d’acheter trois cent cinquante poussins qui viendront en remplacement des poules à reformer. Ainsi, il pourra maintenir à normale la fréquence de livraison d’œufs à ses clients.

loans.use:
Purchase of chicks

Achat de poussins

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Señora Gloria is 48 years old. After seeing that there was a great demand for this work, she decided to make diverse types of dishes in her home to offer to the general public. She has two children who can be found studying in a prestigous center in their city for future professionals and thanks to her daily employment in this activity, she has been able to contribute to their development. The desire to improve the quality of her service drives Gloria to request a loan to fix up her sales space in order to accomodate a greater quantity of people.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Gloria de 48 años de edad, decidió realizar paltillos de diversas clases en casa par ofertarlos al público en general, debido a que observó la gran demanda de esta actividad. Tiene dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando en un centro de formación profesional muy prestigioso de su ciudad y gracias a su desempeño diario en esta actividad ha podido contribuir con su desarrollo.El deseo de mejorar la calidad de su servicio la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para implementar y adecuar su espacio de ventas a fin de albergar a mayor cantidad de personas.

loans.use: Adapt her sales space to accomodate more people.

loans.name: Sara Del Pilar

texts.es:
Señora Sara del Pilar is 26 years old. She has one little son who is three years old and she makes a living by making undergarments in a modest shop that she set up in a space in her house. Everyday she receives orders and since the undergarments are easy to make she does not have a problem accepting them ever due to the amount of time required to make them. However, she does run into the obstacle of not having sufficient raw materials to make these undergarments and many times it has caused her to not accept orders. For this reason she is requesting a loan for a boost of working capital to get her shop running in a space that is better set up and so she can put her name brand on the garments so that they will become well known.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

La señora Sara del Pilar de 26 años de edad, tiene un pequeño niño de tres años de edad y se dedica a confeccionar prendas interiores en un modesto taller que acondicionó en un espacio de su domicilio, a diario recibe pedidos y debido a que son prendas de fácil confección no tiene problemas en aceptarlos incluso con menor tiempo de lo requerido para la confección de estas prendas, sin embargo el obstáculo de no contar con materia prima suficiente muchas veces la han llevado a no aceptar los pedidos. Por esa razón solicita un préstamo a fin de e poco tiempo con la inyección de capital de trabajo que obtenga poner en marcha su taller en un espacio más acondicionado y ponerle un nombre a sus prendas para que estas sean reconocidas.

loans.use: Increase in capital to acquire a greater quantity of raw material for making undergarments.

loans.name: Tchéfiou Akiloyé

texts.fr:
Mr. Tchéfiou Akiloyé O. was born on November 26, 1978 in Lomé. He is married and the father of two children. He has been selling cloth and dressmaking supplies, electrical products, and daily necessities since 2001 in Adidogomé in Lomé. This first loan in the amount of US$ 500 which he is presently requesting will permit him to purchase sewing supplies, among others, 25 bags of buttons, 12 rolls of hooks and eyes, and thirty meters of lining material. Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteerMonsieur O. Tchéfiou Akiloyé est née le 26 novembre 1978 à Lomé. Il est marié et père de deux enfants. Il est revendeur des produits de mercerie, d’électricité et des produits de première nécessité depuis 2001 à Adidogomé à Lomé. 
Le premier crédit d’un montant de 200.000 FCFA qu’il sollicite lui permettra d’acheter des articles pour la mercerie notamment  vingt cinq sachets de boutons, douze rouleaux de grippures et trente mètres de doublures.

loans.use: Expand his stock of sewing suppliesAugmenter son stock de mercerie

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
Dolly is 31 years old. She is a diligent and excellent mother and cook. Two years ago she decided to separate from her husband and join together with her dear mother-in-law to prepare delicious dishes out of her humble home. Her goal is to delight the palates of her community with their excellent flavors. Both have big plans of growth and improvement for their little center of sales, but they desire to start with the complete renovation of their cooking utensils and instruments in order to continue with their work.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

Dolly de 31 años de edad, es una afanosa y excelente madre y cocinera también. Hace un par de años decidió separarse de su esposo y asociarse con su querida suegra para preparar platillos deliciosos desde sus humildes hogares a fin de deleitar con su excelente sazón los paladares de su comunidad.Ambas tienen muchos planes de crecimiento y mejora de su pequeño centro de ventas pero desean iniciar con la renovación completa de sus artículos de cocina para continuar con su labor.

loans.use: renovation of their cooking utensils and instruments

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Mery is an excellent chef. For a long time now she has had a small restaurant where she prepares and sells meals along one of the busiest streets in her city. Her consistency and her excellent dishes have made her business one of the most visited and popular in the area. She needs to make improvements to her restaurant so that she can continue to offer a good service to her clients.

Mery, es una excelente cocinera que ha acondicionado hace mucho tiempo su pequeño espacio de ventas de comidas preparadas en una de las avenidas más transitadas de su querida ciudad.Su constancia y excelente sazón, la han convertido en una de las señoras más visitadas y solicitadas del lugar llegando incluso a preparar platillos para algunos acontecimientos familiares.Desea incrementar su capital de trabajo para mejorar las condiciones del lugar en el que brinda sus servicios día a día a fin de incrementar la satisfacción de sus clientes.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO MAKE IMPROVEMENTS ON HER SMALL RESTAURANT AND CONTINUE TO PROVIDE GOOD SERVICE FOR HER CUSTOMERS.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
Maria del Socorro T. is a mother to three children and makes a living teaching in a small school in the municipality of Villanueva where she lives.
The problem currently facing this humble lady is that she needs to invest in the infrastructure of her home and for this she is seeking help from Ceprodel.  She is requesting to be beneficiary of al loan that will allow her to buy the materials for the construction.
In spite of the difficult financial situation that she has been in for some time, she always tries to give her children the best possible living conditions. Her dream is to see her children turn into successful professionals.
Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.
María del Socorro T. es madre de tres hijos el cual se dedica a la labor de la docencia en un pequeño colegio del municipio de Villanueva donde es originaria.
La problemática que hoy en día atraviesa esta humilde dama es que necesita invertir en su infraestructura de su hogar y para ello ha buscado apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con créditos que le permitan la compra de materiales para la construcción.
A pesar de la difícil situación económica que ha atravesado desde hace mucho tiempo siempre se sigue esforzando para proporcionar a sus hijos las mejores condiciones de vida y así poder ver realizado su sueño de que sus hijos sean unos grandes profesionales y de mucho éxito.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Born on December 31, 1973 in Lomé, Mr. Koffi S. is married and the father of two children who are both enrolled in school. Since 2005, he has been selling construction materials in his shop named "Ets. Dieu Est Vivant", located in Adidogomé. His income from this business permits him to pay his children's school fees.

His customers sometimes request certain supplies that he does not have available for sale, however.

For this reason, he is presently requesting a loan in the amount of US$ 1200 which will allow him to purchase 90 cans of paint, 10 kilograms of nails, and thirty locks. Thus, he will be able to supply all the needs of his customers.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Né le 31 décembre 1973 à Lomé, Monsieur S. Koffi est marié et père de deux enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Depuis 2005, il vend des matériaux de construction dans sa boutique « ETS DIEU EST VIVANT » située à Adidogomé. Il assure la scolarité de ses enfants à travers le revenu provenant de cette activité.

Toutefois, certains matériaux sont désirés par les clients mais que Monsieur S. Koffi ne dispose pas dans sa boutique.

A cet effet, il sollicite un crédit d’un montant de 500.000 FCFA pour acheter quatre vingt dix boîtes de peintures, dix kg de pointe et trente serrures ; Ainsi il pourra répondre à toutes les demandes de ses clients.

loans.use:
Expand his inventory of hardware

Augmenter son stock de quincaillerie

loans.name: Kossi Gakpo

texts.fr:
Mr. Kossi Gakpo S. was born on November 8, 1970 in Badja, which is located 45 kilometers from Lomé. He is married to a hairdresser by the name of Miss Charlotte Ameloko. In his workshop which he calls "Ets. Godwin" he makes shoes, copies keys, and also sells socks. He has been in this business since 1990.

He is requesting a first loan in the amount of US$ 500 which will permit him to purchase some tools of his trade such as a hammer and thread, and to make a display case for shoes he has made.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Monsieur S. Kossi Gakpo est né le 8 novembre 1970 à Badja, localité située à 45 km de Lomé. Il s’est marié à une coiffeuse au nom de Mademoiselle AMELOKU Charlotte. Dans son atelier « ETS GODWIN », il fait la cordonnerie, la reproduction de clef et vend également des chaussettes. Il a commencé par exercer ce métier depuis 1990.

Le premier crédit de 200.000 FCFA qu’il sollicite lui permettra d’acheter les outils de travail tels que : le marteau, le fil à coudre et fabriquer un armoire pouvant permettre d’exposer les chaussures déjà fabriquées.

loans.use:
Purchasing tools of his trade

Acquisition des outils de travail

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en:
Her hopes to improve personally and as a family drive Silvia to travel the streets of her beautiful city every day and offer the beauty products of a very well known international brand. Due to her perseverance they have entrusted her to help other people get started in this market. Her important contribution to the company has greatly satisfied her and she has made it her goal of increasing her capital so that she can install a permanent selling space in a local central market. Her goal is to accessorize her beautiful friends from this stand.

Translated from Spanish by James Lombardo, Kiva volunteer

Sus deseos de mejora personal y familiar, conducen a Silvia a recorrer las calles de su bella ciudad todos los días para ofertar productos de belleza de una reconocida marca internacional. Por su constancia le han encomendado también adicionar a muchas mujeres en esta labor.Su importante contribución a la empresa le ha dado grandes satisfacciones y se ha trazado la meta de incrementar su capital de trabajo para instalar un espacio de ventas permanente en un centro comercial, a fin de asesorar desde este lugar a sus bellas amigas.

loans.use: Increase of capital so she can install a vendor stand in the central market.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
Jessica is 26 years old and has a business selling Chinese medicines. She and her husband sell their natural medicines in the streets of the city. Thanks to her consistency and the increasing demand, her business has been growing. However, she needs more money to invest so that she can offer her clients a greater variety, otherwise she can't increase her income.

Jessica de 26 años de edad se dedica a la comercialización de medicinas chinas por las calles de su ciudad, en compañía de su querido esposo. Gracias a su constancia y a la necesidad que ha surgido en su sociedad están obteniendo muy buenos resultados; sin embargo muchas veces la falta de inversión de capital para ofertar mayor variedad de medicinas naturales chinas disminuye sus ganancias, precisamente a esta necesidad atiende el día de hoy la solicitud de un préstamo.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HER BUSINESS SELLING NATURAL CHINESE MEDICINES, INCREASING THE VARIETY FOR HER CUSTOMERS.

loans.name: Maria Hortencia

texts.es:
Mrs. Maria Hortensia Carrazco makes and sells delicious tortillas in her home in the Villanueva district of the city of Chinandega. Because of her experience in this business, she has gained many customers who are satisfied with the tortillas she makes everyday very early in the morning.

She urgently needs to purchase the ingredients necessary to make her tortillas, which is why she is turning to Ceprodel, confident that she will receive the loan that will allow her to improve her economic status and move her business forward. She has received 4 loans from this institution that have strongly supported both the improvement of her business and the education of her children.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La dama Maria Hortensia Carrazco se dedica al negocio de elaboración y venta de deliciosas tortillas en su casa de habitación en Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega. Con mucha experiencia en este negocio se ha ganado a muchos clientes que se sienten satisfechos de las tortillas que ella prepara todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día.

La necesidad que atraviesa en estos momentos es la urgencia de la compra de la materia prima para las tortillas por esta razón acude a Ceprodel muy confiada creyendo que se le otorgará crédito que le permita mejorar su condición económica y salir adelante en su negocio. Actualmente ella posee 4 créditos con la institución que le han apoyado fuertemente en el mejoramiento de su negocio y en la educación de sus hijos.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients to make tortillas

loans.name: Maritza Del Socorro

texts.es:
Maritza D. is a lady resident of the municipality of Villanueva of Chinandega and makes a living selling prepared food from her home. She started her business selling as a street vendor in Villanueva but upon seeing that her income was small she decided to set her business up in her home where she has been able to attract new customers that buy her food.

Since all businesses need investment, Mrs. Maritza needs to invest in the purchase of raw goods for the preparation of her meals. For this reason she is coming to Ceprodel once more to obtain a timely loan that will allow her to move ahead and continue to sell her food from an area of her home.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

Maritza D. es una dama originaria del municipio de Villanueva de Chinandega y se dedica al negocio de venta de comida en su casa de habitación. Inició su negocio vendiendo ambulantemente por las calles de Villanueva pero al ver que sus ingresos eran escasos decidió establecerse en su vivienda donde hoy en día ha ganado nuevos clientes que compran los alimentos.

Como todo negocio necesita de inversión, la señora Maritza necesita invertir en la compra de materia prima para elaborar sus alimentos. Por este motivo una vez mas acude a Ceprodel para obtener el crédito oportuno que le permita salir adelante y continuar comercializando sus alimentos en su sector de habitación.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients for her meals.

loans.name: Kossiwa Akofa

texts.fr:
Born on February 1, 1981 in Aného (50 kilometers east of Lomé), Mrs. Kossiwa Akofa Z. is a dynamic and organized lady who has started up a small business, a store in which she sells liquors, milk products, and everyday necessities. She is married and is financially responsible for a younger sister who is in high school and two younger brothers who are in middle school.

Mrs. Kossiwa Akofa Z. is currently requesting her first loan in the amount of US$ 1200 to buy 50 cases of beer to stock the new little bar that she has very recently opened.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

Née le 1er février 1981 à Aného (50km à l’Est de Lomé), Madame Z. Kossiwa Akofa est une femme dynamique et organisée qui exerce son commerce à travers la création d’une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des liqueurs, des produits laitiers et des produits de première nécessité. Elle est mariée et supporte une petite sœur qui fait le lycée et deux petits frères qui sont au collège.

Pour la première fois, Madame Z. Kossiwa Akofa sollicite un crédit d’un montant de 500.000FCFA pour acheter Cinquante casiers de bière pour alimenter la nouvelle buvette qu’elle vient de créer tout récemment.

loans.use:
stock up on drinks

S'approvisionner en boissons gazeuses

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
The sale of cold drinks and good customer service is the daily routine for Josefina. She has a small stand well located along the lake in Yarinacocha. She is very pleased to be in such a good location as many people come through and lots of tourists come to enjoy the natural beauty. Josefina is 41 years old and the mother of 2 children, both of them are now independent and working. She would like to remodel her stand to be able to serve the greater numbers of tourists who visit her small business.

La venta de bebidas heladas y otorgar una buena atención es la rutina diaria que desempeña con mucha alegría la señora Josefina, quien posee un pequeño espacio de ventas en un lugar muy apropiado y a orillas de la laguna de Yarinacocha (Pucallpa), está muy contenta de estar en este lugar ya que concurre a diario mucha gente de todos los lugares y sobre todo turistas para apreciar la belleza de este incomparable paisaje. Josefina a sus 41 años de edad es madre de 2 hijos quienes son profesionales e independientes.Desea iniciar su plan de remodelación para acoger a mayor cantidad de turistas en su pequeño centro de ventas.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO REMODEL HER SMALL STAND TO BETTER SERVE THE GROWING NUMBER OF TOURISTS WHO VISIT HER BUSINESS.

loans.name: Egna

texts.es:
A short time ago, Egna set up a small space to sell cold drinks in a tourist center of her city. Up until now, business has not gone all that well, but it's certain that little by little more people are coming to her small stand. She is requesting a loan to be able to offer more variety and quality to her customers, and help make her small business well known.

Egna, hace poco instaló un pequeño espacio de ventas de bebidas heladas en un centro turístico de su ciudad, hasta el momento las cosas no parecen marchar muy bien pero está segura que poco a poco las personas acudirán a su pequeño local en búsqueda de sus servicios.Con este propósito y a fin de ofrecer además de variedad calidad desea obtener un préstamo a fin de hacerse conocida y muy popular dentro de poco también iniciará las ventas de platos típicos en este espacio ya que tiene la esperanza de convertirlo en el espacio turístico de mayor visita.

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HER BUSINESS AND OFFER A GREATER VARIETY  OF DRINKS TO HER CUSTOMERS.

loans.name: Marta Felipa

texts.es:
Marta Felipa B. is a strong woman worthy of being a role model to others due to how hard she works in her business raising cattle, which is the sole source of supporting her four small school-aged children who also help their mother when they have the time to do so.

From a young age she has dedicated herself to this difficult work which makes it possible for her to support her family without any difficulty. Today she finds herself in need of buying calves to raise and therefore she is seeking CEPRODEL’s support in obtaining a loan that would enable her to buy these animals and continue to support her home and family.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

Marta Felipa B. es una dama muy esforzada y digna de imitar debido a que trabaja fuertemente en el negocio de crianza de ganado con el único fin de mantener a sus cuatro pequeños hijos en edad escolar y que también apoyan a su madre cuando tienen tiempo de hacerlo.

Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a esta pesada labor con la que hace posible mantener a su familia sin ningún problema. La necesidad atravesada por ella hoy en día es la compra de vaquillas para la crianza y es por este motivo que busca apoyo en CEPRODEL para obtener créditos directos que le permitan la compra de estos animales y así continuar con el mantenimiento de su hogar que tanto necesita de ella.

loans.use: Purchase calves

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia is 44 years old and for many years she has worked at her small grocery store. This work enabled her to provide for her children and help them reach their goals. Now, with her husband, she would like to invest in her small store and convert it into a minimarket, able to meet the needs of the people in her community.

La señora Sonia de 44 años de edad desde hace mucho tiempo se ha desempeñado en su tiendita y con la ayuda de ella ha podido contribuir con sus hijos para que estos puedan alcanzar sus sueños y las metas que se han trazado. Ahora solo goza de la compañía de su querido esposo y juntos desean trabajar aún más para alcanzar su meta de formar un minimercado capaz de abastecer las demandas de su comunidad.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HER SMALL GROCERY STORE AND CONVERT IT INTO A MINIMARKET, BETTER MEETING THE NEEDS OF THE PEOPLE IN HER COMMUNITY.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga's chronic ailment drove her to experiment with natural alternative medicine to appease her pain, as well as the consequences of her past malady. The Omnilife products were recommended to her, and she was under this treatment for a long time. After some time her pain and fatigue dissipated. This result is the reason why she decided to sell this and similar products. She recounts her story to millions of suffering and hopeless people. She is now the most popular salesperson of this product because of her testimony. She has decided to install a small product display space in her home. With your important contribution, she will succeed in that which she set out to accomplish.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Hace mucho el padecimiento de Olga la condujo a probar con la medicina natural, alternativa para aplacar dolores y demás consecuencias de la enfermedad que tenía, le recomendaron los productos de Omnilife y estuvo bajo tratamiento por un largo período, al cabo de este sus dolencias y fatigas se fueron, y a razón de este hecho decidió incursionar en la venta de los mismos para contar su historia a miles de personas que padecen como ella y creen que todo está perdido; se ha convertido en una de las vendedoras más populares de este producto por su testimonio y ha decidido instalar un pequeño centro de asesoramiento en su domicilio, con vuestra importante ayuda alcnzará lo que se ha propuesto.

loans.use: To install a small product display space in her home

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es:
Ms Florinda is an active woman with many desires to succeed. She has sold beauty products, like perfumes, talcum powder, lipstick, nail cutters, and other things, for many years. She is an elementary school teacher. Thanks to her charisma and cheerfulness in selling her products she has gained a great number of clients. For this reason she has now decided to install a display counter so that she can exhibit her products and increase her demand and profit.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Florinda es una mujer activa y con muchos deseos de superación, se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a la venta de productos de belleza como: perfumes, talcos, labiales, correctores para uñas, entre otras cositas. Es profesora de educación inicial y gracias a su carisma y jovialidad al ofertar sus productos tiene una gran gama de clientes, es por eso que ahora ha optado por poner un mostrador para que en el se puedan exponer sus productos y acrecentar su demanda y ganancias.

loans.use: To increase capital and offer a greater number of beauty products

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Ms Angela is 62 years old. She has been selling sweets for a very long time. She also sells cheeses throughout the outskirts of the city of Pucallpa. Angela is a very hard-working woman. She asks for a loan to increase her small business and to make some repairs to her home.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Angela de 62 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de dulces desde hace mucho tiempo, también vende quesos por los alrededores de la ciudad de Pucallpa. Angela es una mujer luchadora y sobre todo trabajadora.El proyecto de incrementar aún más su pequeño espacio de ventas co el propósito de realizar algunas reparaciones en su domicilio la conducen a solicitar vuestra ayuda a través de un préstamo.

loans.use: To increase capital to offer a greater quantity and variety of groceries
